title: [Large-scale] Building a Community of Wisdom Through Online Cultural Education and Collaborative Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Cultivates collaborative problem-solving skills through online cultural education for science field job seekers at vocational training institutions

learning_goals: Analyze and discuss online cultural content from a social constructivist perspective
Propose three or more intercultural communication strategies through collaborative inquiry processes

Learners can use VR devices (e.g., Oculus Quest) and digital tools (e.g., Unity, Blender) to create a cultural experience project proposal within 3 days and collect and incorporate at least three user feedbacks through a prototype demonstration on day 5.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
